item.title: Disney shares climb 10% on surprise uptick in streaming subscribers, earnings beat
item.description: Disney upped some of its fiscal 2025 guidance and posted revenue growth in all three of its business segments.

item.title: Uber misses revenue expectations with trips up 18% over last year
item.description: CEO Dara Khosrowshahi said that autonomous vehicle tech is "the single greatest opportunity ahead for Uber."

item.title: Doordash announces $1.2 billion SevenRooms deal, misses revenue expectations
item.description: Doordash on Tuesday announced the $1.2 billion acquisition of restaurant booking platform SevenRooms and reported first-quarter earnings.

item.title: Novo Nordisk shares pop as drugmaker sees copycat Wegovy sales easing in 2025
item.description: Novo Nordisk on Wednesday reported a better-than-expected rise in net profit but lowered its full-year sales growth forecast.

item.title: Trump tariffs and export curbs on China cast a cloud over major chip stocks
item.description: Chip companies from AMD to Super Micro said U.S. tariff policy and export restrictions to China have caused uncertainty for their businesses.
